title: A Whispered Ramble on R.E.M, Skiing, and More
description: On episode 234 of Sleep and Relax ASMR, I whisper about R.E.M, skiing, and other unrelated topics in another rendition of ASMRambles. Get $50 off select mattresses at www.Casper.com/ASMR and using promo code ASMR at checkout. Terms and Conditions Apply. Thanks to Maria, Beth, Philip, Lori, and Heide for supporting the show via Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sleepandrelaxasmr Donate: https://goo.gl/55Dj7k Website: www.SleepandRelaxASMR.com Email: Hello@SleepandRelaxASMR.com --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app --- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/sleepandrelaxasmr/support
